content.question: How do I work?
columns: My philosophy is win-win-win work, where everyone benefits from our collaboration: business profits increase, customers are satisfied
And I get not only fair compensation based on work results, but also grow together with the team

items.text: Experience from startups to ecosystems of large companies
Experience in many industries: FinTech, eCommerce, iGaming, AI, Cloud Services
Extensive experience with all platforms: Web/mobile, iOS, Android
I work directly with the development team and PM
I independently organize all work from analysis to release delivery
I form deadlines, goals and KPIs so that cooperation is transparent
